email-messages.subject: Meeting tomorrow
email-messages.content: Hi Jane, I wanted to remind you that we have a meeting tomorrow at 10am.

email-messages.subject: Re: Meeting tomorrow
email-messages.content: Thanks for the reminder, John. I'll be there on time.

email-messages.subject: Re: Meeting tomorrow
email-messages.content: Looking forward to seeing you both tomorrow!

email-messages.subject: Lunch invitation
email-messages.content: Hey John, would you like to grab lunch with me next week?

email-messages.subject: Re: Lunch invitation
email-messages.content: Sure, let's do it! How about Wednesday?

email-messages.subject: Project update
email-messages.content: Hi John, just wanted to give you a quick update on the project. We're making good progress and should be on track for the deadline.

email-messages.subject: Re: Project update
email-messages.content: Thanks for letting me know, Alice. Keep up the good work!

email-messages.subject: Happy Birthday!
email-messages.content: Happy Birthday, Jane! Hope you have a great day.

email-messages.subject: Re: Happy Birthday!
email-messages.content: Thanks so much, Bob! It's been a great day so far.

email-messages.subject: Need your help
email-messages.content: Hey John, I'm having some trouble with the code. Can you take a look when you get a chance?
